name: Bows and Bubbles
description:
Kill them, kill them fast! Features planed:
  • Merging bubbles
  • Roket bubbles
  • Use mouse as controller
  • Key mapping
  • Settings
  • Multiplayer (global and local)
  • Upgrade system
System requirements:
  • Java 13 or newer
Default key binds:
  • Left: arrow left
  • Right: arrow right
  • Jump: arrow up
  • Gadget: right shift
  • Shoot: space
